alert.note: Alert for Coosa; Elmore; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 3:46PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Elmore, southwestern Tallapoosa and southeastern Coosa Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 346 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wind Creek State Park to near Equality to near Blue Ridge. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexander City, Wetumpka, Tallassee, Dadeville, Equality, Eclectic, Jacksons` Gap, Martin Dam, Santuck, Reeves Airport, Southern Lake Martin, Dexter, Eastern Lake Martin, Western Lake Martin, Blue Ridge, Kowaliga Bridge, Wind Creek State Park, Still Waters Resort, Northern Lake Martin and Fishpond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
